title: Luxury retail segment growth in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2008 to 2018
summary: Overall All retail is gradually increasing, Luxury segment is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Luxury segment, and lastly, 2. All retail.
The difference of SOME LABEL between Luxury segment and All retail is smaller at Year 2013-2018 compared to the Year 2008-2013.
